name: Tramezzino al tonkatsu
desc: A nutritionally-balanced meal. The two bread slices clip a thick-cut katsu slab between them. The fragrant, slightly sweet-and-sour sauce is the key to preventing this meal from being too rich. A brilliant mix of outlander style and local flavor!

customize.name: Ricetta: Tramezzino al tonkatsu
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Katsu Sandwich.

customize.name: Farina
customize.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

customize.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Cavolo
customize.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

customize.name: Tramezzino al tonkatsu delizioso
customize.desc: A nutritionally-balanced meal. The fragrant and fluffy bread fills you right up, while the crispy, juicy katsu titillates the senses. One single bite is all it takes to fill you from tongue to gut with satisfaction. Now then, who was the one who first thought of this brilliant combination?

customize.name: Tramezzino al tonkatsu sospetto
customize.desc: A nutritionally-balanced meal. Well, you say that, but vegetables are withered, the meat is dry and wooden, and the bread slices are way too firm... You know what? It doesn't matter. A person needs to fill their stomach and all...

customize.name: Shikanoin Heizou
customize.desc: Un giovane investigatore prodigio della Commissione Tenryou dai sensi acuti e dalla mente chiara.

customize.name: L'unica verità
customize.desc: Shikanoin Heizou's specialty. On the tender, moist scrambled eggs lies a juicy katsu fried to golden perfection, its aroma most enticing indeed... Having been tempted to gobble the dish down, you are somehow seized by the urge to let out all that is hidden in your heart — this is not some sort of secret weapon of Heizou... is it?

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
